Text:
function EP_BAD_10()

  -- なぜなのボク姫
  SaveData.Title = "なぜなのボク姫"

  SAVE()

  -- //ウランルートEP4の姫選挙に失敗した際に発生。

LAYER_CLEAR_ALL()

LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)

-- //SE：開始音（ﾃﾚﾃﾃﾚﾃﾃｰ!!）
PLAY_SE("SEz006.wav")
-- //BG：なぜなのボク姫（開始）

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano01.wav")
  MSG([[
  【？？？？】
 "Three!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano02.wav")
  MSG([[
  【？？？？】
 "Two!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano03.wav")
  MSG([[
  【？？？？】
 "One!" ]])

  PLAY_BGM("BGM07.wav",0,true)
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028aa")
  LAYER_SCALE(LAYER_BG,500,500)
  LAYER_MOVE_SCALE(LAYER_BG,100,100,500,Ease.OutSine)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

  EFFECT_SCREEN(1,30,30,500,false,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano04.wav")
  MSG([[
  【？？？？】
 "Boom!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano05.wav")
  MSG([[
  【？？？？】
 "Wheeeeeee!" ]])

  -- //BG：なぜなのボク姫背景
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028ba")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask023",1000,false)
  -- //BU：ミナト（笑顔）、アキラ・メヒＴ（通常）
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ea")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

--PLAY_BGM("BGM07.wav",1000,true)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano06.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato・Akira】
 "Why, Bokuhime?!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano07.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】笑顔
 "Everyone, please gather around!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano08.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】笑顔
 "No worries even if you reach a bad ending! It's time for 'Why, Bokuhime'—explaining why you got the ending you did!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano138.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】メヒＴ・通常
 "If you want to win this Princess Election, please review the training between Uran and Minato. That's all." ]])


  STOP_BGM(1000)
  -- //BG：なぜなのボク姫（おわり）
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028ca")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano139.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "Well then, see you again!" ]])

  -- //BG：なぜなのボク姫背景
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028ba")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask007",300,false)

  PLAY_BGM("BGM07.wav",0,true)

  -- //BU：ミナト（焦り）、アキラ・メヒＴ（通常）
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ga")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano140.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】焦り
 "Too quick, too quick! Lack of motivation is usual, but why do you try to end it in one sentence!?" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04da")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano141.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】メヒＴ・悲しみ
 "But that person’s a winner, right? Their family’s rich, their chest is big, their appearance flashy, and yeah, their chest is big!" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ba")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano142.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】メヒＴ・真剣
 "What advice can a loser like me give? Honestly, I want you to teach me how to get a bigger chest!" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01da")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano143.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】悲しみ
 "Th-that’s just absurd..." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano144.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】メヒＴ・真剣
 "Even though Minato doesn’t fall for Lira or me at all, you somehow totally fall for Uran!" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04da")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano145.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】メヒＴ・悲しみ
 "Truly, this is a disparity society of chest size. You like older women with big chests too, right? Isn’t that right?" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ga")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",100,true)

  LAYER_EFFECT(50,6,30,30,500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano146.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】焦り
 "N-no, no, that’s not true! I might actually like older women but..." ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ba")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano147.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】メヒＴ・真剣
 "See! Minato’s a boob fan! The inverse Laharl! The existence-type sexual harasser!" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01da")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)

  LAYER_EFFECT(50,6,0,50,500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano148.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】悲しみ
 "That’s a misunderstanding! It doesn’t matter if the chest is big or small!" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano149.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】メヒＴ・真剣
 "...Grr. Do you think you could still say that after turning into a woman?" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ka")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano150.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】メヒＴ・ニヤリ
 "Gender changer—! Please turn Minato’s gender into female!" ]])

  MSG([[ Thanks for coming~. ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_MIN01ca")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano151.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Minato】驚き
 "G-gender changer...? What’s that—" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
  -- //BG：なぜなのボク姫背景
  -- //BU：エリカ（焦り）、アキラ・メヒＴ（通常）
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028ba")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask023",1000,false)
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"BU_ERI01ga")
  LAYER_POSITION(50,-400,0)
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04aa")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",500,false)

  LAYER_EFFECT(50,6,30,30,500,false)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano152.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】焦り
 "Eeeeeeeeeh!? M-my body is really becoming a woman!?" ]])

  LAYER_LOAD(55,"BU_AKI04ea")
  LAYER_POSITION(55,400,0)
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",300,true)
PLAY_VOICE("nazenano153.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】メヒＴ・笑顔
 "Try living once as a real woman. You'll truly understand how we flat-chested comrades feel." ]])

  STOP_BGM(1000)
  -- //BG：なぜなのボク姫（おわり）
  LAYER_LOAD(50,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(55,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(60,"")
  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG000aa")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

  LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG,"BG028ca")
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",1000,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano154.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "Eh!? Is it over with this!? Seriously!? Can you get away with just dropping it like this!? Hey, Nippon Ichi Software!?" ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano155.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Akira】
 "It’s true, some people can’t accept a gender change in a cross-dressing game. Let’s quickly revert back." ]])

PLAY_VOICE("nazenano156.wav")
  MSG([[
  【Erika】
 "That’s not the issue at all!!!!" ]])

  -- //ウランルート第４章［結-2］冒頭から再開
  SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000",0,false)
  WAIT_INPUT(1000)

  -- 　　　　◆
STOP_BGM(1000)
LAYER_LOAD(LAYER_BG, "")
SWITCH_SCREEN("mask000" , 1000,false)
WAIT_INPUT(1000)

SystemSaveData.IsClearEP_BAD_10 = true;
ScenarioManager.Next(SaveData.BadNextScenario)
SaveData.BadNextScenario = ""

end
